lyrics.text: Lesson 87. A perfect alibi. First listen and then answer the question. What was wrong with
lyrics.translation: 第87课。一个完美的不在场证明。首先听录音，然后回答问题。有什么问题吗？

lyrics.text: the man's story? At the time the murder was committed, I was traveling on the 8 o'clock
lyrics.translation: 那个男人的故事？在谋杀发生的时候，我正在乘坐8点钟的火车

lyrics.text: train to London, said the man. Do you always catch such an early train? asked the inspector.
lyrics.translation: 去伦敦的火车，那人说。你总是赶这么早的火车吗？检票员问道。

lyrics.text: Of course I do, answered the man. I must be at work at 10 o'clock. My employer will confirm that
lyrics.translation: 当然，我确实如此，男人回答道。我必须在10点钟开始工作。我的雇主会证实这一点的。

lyrics.text: I was there on time. Would a later train get you to work on time? asked the inspector.
lyrics.translation: 我按时到了那里。晚一点的火车能让你准时上班吗？检查员问道。

lyrics.text: I suppose it would, but I never catch a later train.
lyrics.translation: 我想是的，但我从没赶上过更晚的火车。

lyrics.text: At what time did you arrive at the station?
lyrics.translation: 你什么时候到达车站的？

lyrics.text: At 10 to 8. I bought a paper and waited for the train.
lyrics.translation: 在7点51分，我买了一份报纸，然后等待火车。

lyrics.text: And you didn't notice anything unusual? Of course not.
lyrics.translation: 你没有注意到任何不寻常的事情吗？当然没有。

lyrics.text: But I suggest, said the inspector, that you are not telling the truth. I suggest that you did not
lyrics.translation: 但我建议，检查员说，你没有说实话。我建议你并没有

lyrics.text: catch the 8 o'clock train, but that you caught the 8.25, which would still get you to work on time.
lyrics.translation: 赶上8点钟的火车，但你赶上了8点25分的火车，这仍然可以让你准时到达工作地点。

lyrics.text: You see, on the morning of the murder, the 8 o'clock train did not run at all.
lyrics.translation: 你看，在谋杀案发生的那天早上，8点钟的火车根本就没有运行。

lyrics.text: It broke down at Fern Green station and was taken off the line.
lyrics.translation: 它在Fern Green站发生故障并被撤出线路。
